author: ET Online and Agencies
title: Mrs Nadella donates Rs 2 cr to PM Modi's fund
description: Mrs Nadella donates Rs 2 cr to PM Modi's fundIn a tweet, V-P Venkaiah Naidu thanked Mrs Nadella for showing solidarity with Indians at this hour.
content: HYDERABAD: A week after donating to the Telangana Chief Minister Welfare Fund, Anupama V Nadella, wife of Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella, made a generous contribution to PM Narendra Modi's emergency fund - PM-CARES Fund - through her savings. A family source con… [+5230 chars]
